posts.content:
Powerfest tickets are now on sale and available through the website at www.powerfest.co.uk . We have booking discounts until 18th May. However, the Super Saver price is available on weekend tickets until the end of February (look out for the ‘Sale’ sign).

Traders also benefit from increased discounts until the end of February. Please get in touch to discuss trading.

Really hoping that we see more dubs on the track this year either as race cars or Run What you Brung

Super Saver tickets are available for Weekend tickets until 28th February. Tickets can be bought from the website at www.powerfest.co.uk . All tickets are discounted until near the event but the biggest savings are to be had by the end of February.

We’ve got a great weekend lined up with some great live music……….Headliners The Style Selektors will deliver some fine 2 Tone Ska, Ska and reggae https://www.facebook.com/video.php?v=898569703539962 . Saturday night sees A Band Apart firing through the Tarantino film soundtracks https://www.youtube.com/watch?featur...&v=HoivOq_5IVE with support from Black Dog, a Led Zep tribute. More music to be confirmed soon.

The drag strip will have racing all day Sunday and Monday with plenty of time to test your Dub in Run What You Brung!

On site you’ll find caterers, traders and even some dodgems!

Here’s a link to some photos from last year. http://rdsmith.zenfolio.com/powerfest-2014 It would be superb to see more dubs going down the track this year

Tickets on sale from the website at http://www.powerfest.co.uk . We're at York Raceway and we are absolutely committed to hosting a great weekend of dubs, drag strip action, music, traders, caterers and more in the north of England. Let the dubs hit the strip.............

A couple of things for the weekend -

The Show n Shine will take place on Sunday with trophies for Best In Show, Best Beetle sponsored by Just Kampers, Best Bus sponsored by Just Kampers, Best Custom and Best Interior.

We will be running an open mic session in the marquee from midday until 3pm on Monday subject to demand - we've got a great PA in place so feel free to show us your musical talent. If you want to book a place then do get in touch.
